Curses be upon them who are responsible for the creation and development of this game, for they have greatly sinned against the well-being of mankind. Indeed, Valve hath committed an abomination. O, mankind, fear not; for the Child of Prophecy, the One who Bringeth Light (Glory Be Upon Him), shall avenge your lost lives by conquering the Land of Valve as the Vanguard of Army of Enlightenment, to end this persecution. Cannot the Four-Eyed God of Steam hold Him back, for He shall not stop fighting for His righteous cause, for He will not back down until he achieveth what he fighteth for.
